CustomField.description: When checked the linked Contact will be copied on all emails sent regarding the "Assigned To" record. Defaults to the value of the same field on the related "Role" configuration.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When checked the linked Contact will be copied on all emails sent regarding the "Assigned To" record. Defaults to the value of the same field on the related "Role" configuration.
CustomField.label: Receives Email Notifications
